stableCoin.description: Stable coin to compare against (Tether recommended)

tickInterval.description: Interval (minutes) inbetween each request for current values. Allowed intervals for Binance is 1m, 3m, 5m, 15m, 30m

concurrentOrders.description: Max amount of orders at the same time

minInitialValues.description: For ROC 14 at least 15 intervals are needed

minAlgorithmValues.description: For WMA 10 of ROC 14 at least 25 intervals are needed

falsePositiveBuffer.description: Multiplier of 12h price change to avoid buying at false positive (too close to 12 closing price)

ATRmultiplier.description: Multiplier of ATR to set sell point
